name: A Better Twitter - Modded
description:
A slightly modified version of "A Better Twitter" from natuschaos with additional tweaks. 

-Eliminates annoyances
-Increases the width of the tweet boxes
-Removes avatars/images
-A few more things.

Based on the original script called "A Better Twitter" by natuschaos.
